text.section: Except as otherwise provided, each required signal given by hand and arm shall be given from the left side of the vehicle in the manner specified in this section.
A left turn signal is given by the hand and arm extended horizontally.
A right turn signal is given by the hand and arm extended upward; except that a bicyclist may extend the right hand and arm horizontally to the right.
A stop or decrease in speed signal is given by the hand and arm extended downward.
